body_html:
Oh, I am so sorry, I totally misread that.
You can set TensorFlow environment variable TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL to 2 as follows:

import os
os.environ['TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL']='2'
import tensorflow as tf

It will filter out WARNING logs.

body:
Oh, I am so sorry, I totally misread that. 
You can set TensorFlow environment variable `TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL` to 2 as follows:
```
import os
os.environ['TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL']='2'
import tensorflow as tf
```
It will filter out WARNING logs.
